description: This file defines an authentication page component for a React application, handling login, signup, password reset using Supabase auth, and managing related UI states and errors.

methods.name: AuthPage()
methods.description: React functional component managing authentication UI and logic for login, signup, and password reset.

methods.name: mapAuthError
methods.description: Maps raw authentication error messages to user-friendly messages.

methods.name: switchMode
methods.description: Switches between login, signup, and reset modes, resetting form state.

methods.name: doLogin
methods.description: Performs login operation with email and password, then redirects upon success.

methods.name: doSignup
methods.description: Performs signup, with email validation and password policy enforcement, handling email verification flow.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, executing the appropriate auth action based on mode.

methods.name: renderPasswordHelpers
methods.description: Displays password requirements guidance during signup.
